mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.order_no, t.request_params, t.response_string, t.order_string, t.add_time
mapper.delete: delete from alipay_payment_log where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into alipay_payment_log ( user_id, order_no, request_params, response_string, order_string, add_time ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestParams,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{responseString,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{orderString,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
